name: Boynton Beach
description: Licensed Boynton Beach electricians providing 24/7 professional residential and commercial services. Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice for safe, reliable power solutions throughout Boynton Beach.
tagline: The Gateway to the Gulf Stream

challenges.title: Coastal Weather Vulnerability
challenges.description: Boynton's proximity to the Gulf Stream means intense seasonal weather. We prioritize whole-home surge protection and robust backup power solutions for coastal residents.

challenges.title: Established Community Safety
challenges.description: Mature neighborhoods require expert electrical auditing to ensure aging panels and wiring can safely handle modern technology loads and high-efficiency HVAC.

challenges.title: Waterfront Dock Electrical
challenges.description: With its active marina and waterfront properties, Boynton requires specialized dock wiring and boat lift power that meets strict marine safety standards.

faqs.question: Can you install dock power at our Boynton Beach Intracoastal home?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Boynton's waterfront properties near the inlet and along the Intracoastal need specialized dock electrical that meets NEC Article 555 marina safety requirements. We install dock pedestals with properly rated circuits, boat lift power, shore power connections, and seawall lighting—all using marine-grade corrosion-resistant components.

faqs.question: We live in Aberdeen—what electrical issues are common in our community?
faqs.answer: Aberdeen homes are typically well-maintained, but many are now 15-20+ years old. Common requests include panel upgrades to support EV chargers and home additions, landscape lighting installations, and whole-home surge protection. We also see builder-grade fixtures that homeowners want to upgrade and the addition of ceiling fans and home office circuits.

faqs.question: Is Palm Beach County permitting different from Broward?
faqs.answer: Yes, Palm Beach County has its own permitting process and code requirements that differ from Broward and Miami-Dade. We're licensed to work in all three counties and handle all permitting for Boynton Beach projects. Understanding the specific requirements of each jurisdiction is part of our job—you don't need to worry about it.

faqs.question: Do you service the commercial district near Congress Avenue?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide commercial electrical services along Congress Avenue, Boynton Beach Boulevard, and the surrounding business areas. Services include tenant buildouts, retail and restaurant electrical, parking lot lighting, and 24/7 emergency response for businesses that can't afford extended outages.

faqs.question: Our Valencia Reserve home is all-electric with no gas—should we have a generator?
faqs.answer: For all-electric homes in Boynton Beach, generators become even more important—when power goes out, you lose not just AC but also your cooktop, water heating, and everything else. We size generators to handle the full electrical load or prioritize critical circuits based on your preferences and budget.

faqs.question: How quickly can you respond to emergencies in Boynton Beach?
faqs.answer: We provide electrical services to the Boynton Beach area as part of our regional coverage. For urgent requirements, we allocate technical resources based on the specific safety needs of the property.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Boynton Beach Electricians Since 2003
seoContent.body: Boynton Beach is a city of incredible natural beauty and growing opportunity. Known as the 'Gateway to the Gulf Stream,' it's a community that values its coastal heritage and its future progress. Solomon Electric is proud to provide the safe and reliable electrical foundation Boynton families and businesses need to thrive. Our electricians are dispatched from strategic locations across Palm Beach County, often arriving within 60 minutes. We maintain full parts inventory on every truck, so most repairs and installations are completed in a single visit.

seoContent.heading: Expert Electrical Solutions for Boynton Beach Properties
seoContent.body: Whether your Boynton Beach property needs panel upgrades, modern lighting, EV charging, or emergency repairs, our licensed electricians deliver solutions built for Palm Beach County's building codes and South Florida's demanding climate. We handle all permitting and inspections so you don't have to. Every project in Boynton Beach is handled by W-2 employees—never subcontractors. Our electricians are drug-tested, background-checked, and carry our $2M liability insurance. We treat your home with the same care and respect we'd want in our own.

seoContent.heading: Serving Every Neighborhood in Boynton Beach
seoContent.body: From Aberdeen, Canyon Lakes, Cobblestone Village to Valencia Reserve, our electricians provide full-service coverage throughout Boynton Beach. We understand the specific electrical characteristics of each area — from older homes that need rewiring to new construction requiring modern smart home systems. Boynton Beach properties face unique electrical challenges from South Florida's heat, humidity, and storm exposure. We use marine-grade hardware, UV-resistant conduit, and corrosion-resistant components that last in this environment.

seoContent.heading: Excellence in Electrical Care for Your Boynton Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're finishing a remodel in Canyon Lakes, needing dock power near the marina, or requiring an urgent repair in Aberdeen, our licensed team is here for you. We provide professional service, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that has made us a local leader for over 18 years. From routine outlet installations to complex rewiring projects, we handle all aspects of residential and commercial electrical work in Boynton Beach. Every job includes upfront pricing, clean worksite practices, and a satisfaction guarantee.
